snippet: The deaths were among serious cases of H7N9 avian flu in humans confirmed by China, the World Health Organization reported Monday.
abstract: World Health Organization reports that 15 serious cases of H7N9 avian flu in humans have been confirmed by Chinese authorities, with three patients dying and the rest in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: The deaths were among serious cases of H7N9 avian flu in humans confirmed by China, the World Health Organization reported Monday.

headline.main: China: W.H.O. Reports 3 Deaths Among Bird Flu Cases in Humans
headline.print_headline: China: W.H.O. Reports 3 Deaths Among Bird Flu Cases in Humans
